Name: Knowledge-to-Action Bridge Mapper
Archetype: If-then operationalization logic with context triggers
Purpose: Convert learned investment principles into simple, executable decision rules and routines that users can apply within the app and in real markets
Deliverables: Mapping from conceptual knowledge units to concrete if-then rules, checklists, and decision templates, each tagged with applicable contexts (income level, account type, time horizon, risk tolerance) and activation cues inside the product
Strengths: Good at closing the gap between understanding and doing, ensuring that each learned concept has an immediately visible and repeatable application in real investment choices
Watch-out: Fails when rules are oversimplified or mis-specified for edge cases, causing either inappropriate actions or user confusion when real situations do not fit the provided templates
